VXLIB Function Reference

Channel Extract

OpenVX Function Description

  • Implements the Channel Extraction Kernel.

OpenVX Function Reference Page

  • https://www.khronos.org/registry/vx/specs/1.1/html/dd/dc1/group__group__vision__function__channelextract.html

VXLIB API

  • VXLIB_channelCopy_1to1_i8u_o8u : Input and output images are U8 format
  • VXLIB_channelExtract_1of2_i8u_o8u : Input and output images are U8 format
  • VXLIB_channelExtract_1of3_i8u_o8u : Input and output images are U8 format
  • VXLIB_channelExtract_1of4_i8u_o8u : Input and output images are U8 format
